sql.query: INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, password, first_name, last_name, email, date_registered, date_last_login, disabled) SELECT 1 AS user_id, s1.setting_value AS username, s2.setting_value AS password, s1.setting_value AS first_name, '' AS last_name, s3.setting_value AS email, NOW() AS date_registered, NOW() AS date_last_login, 0 AS disabled FROM site_settings s1, site_settings s2, site_settings s3 WHERE s1.setting_name = 'username' AND s2.setting_name = 'password' AND s3.setting_name = 'contact_email'
